channel.title: This keeps happening when i edit a 317 Shop as the tut in the source shows me
channel.description:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2 at server.world.ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:142) at server.world.ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:45) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:64) Press any key to continue . . .

Client(Non-Edited) http://uppit.com/j63l3t4i3aze/Realm_Onwards_Client.rar
can someone try fixing it or tell me
